opinions.snippet:
Opinion of the Court
DARDEN, Judge:
The appellant was brought to trial before a general court-martial convened at Lake Mead Base, Nevada, for the breach of a lawful order and for involuntary manslaughter, violations of Articles 92 and 119, Uniform Code of Military Justice, 10 USC §§ 892 and 919, respectively. Contrary to his plea, he was found guilty as charged and given a sentence of confinement at hard
